pages.title: Wagwan Oscroh,
pages.content: I have been thinking about this past year and I realized I could not look back without appreciating you properly. You have been more than just a friend. You have been someone I could talk to honestly, laugh with, think out loud with, and just be myself around. That means a lot to me, and I do not take it for granted at all.

pages.title: What You Mean To Me
pages.content: There were moments this year that would have felt heavier or lonelier if you were not around, whether it was through our random conversations, your advice, shared jokes, or just your presence. You have shown consistency, loyalty, and a kind of quiet support that many people do not know how to give. You are the type of person who makes life feel a little lighter, and I am genuinely grateful for that.

pages.title: Your Impact
pages.content: I respect the way you think, the way you handle situations, and the kind of person you are growing into. You inspire me in your own way through your mindset, your resilience, and the way you always try to be better. You have had a real impact on my year, even in ways you may not fully realize.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content: Thank you for the times you checked in, the times you listened, the times you challenged me, and the times we just laughed about nonsense. Thank you for showing up as a real friend, not just when things were fun, but when they were uncertain too. People like you are rare, and I am genuinely glad our paths crossed.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content: As we move into a new year, I am rooting for you. Your growth, your wins, your peace, and everything you are working towards. I pray you find clarity where you need it, strength when things get tough, and joy in the small moments along the way. You deserve good things, and I hope this year brings you even more of them.

pages.title: With Gratitude
pages.content: I appreciate you deeply, bro. Thanks for being you, and thanks for being a solid part of my life this past year. More life, more growth, and more moments ahead.\n\n Murewa

pages.title: Movies for 2026
list: The Killing of a Sacred Deer

tarotCard.name: The Lovers
tarotCard.meaning:
The Lovers card represents alignment, loyalty, and meaningful connections the kind of bond that helps you grow and stay grounded. When I think of our friendship, it reminds me of that energy. You’ve been someone I can trust and be real with, and I really value the presence and clarity you bring into my life./nFor 2026, I pray it becomes a Lovers-card kind of year for you: a year of good decisions, the right people around you, peace in your journey, and opportunities that align with your purpose and values. May every choice you make lead you closer to the life you’re building, and may your relationships bring you strength, clarity, and joy.
I appreciate you, and I’m rooting for everything ahead of you this year

pages.title: Dear David,
pages.content: As we step into 2025, I wanted to share some thoughts with you...
2024 was a year of growth, challenges, and beautiful moments. Through it all, you've shown incredible resilience and grace.

pages.title: Yo emBeDdings,
pages.content: I have been thinking about this past year and when I look back at everything that happened, your presence stands out in a really special way. I felt like I should not just think it silently, so I wanted to actually write this to you, because you were a real part of my year in a way that mattered deeply to me.

pages.title: Our Year Together
pages.content: When I think about our year together, I see late conversations, brainstorming moments, shared curiosity, experiments, effort, small wins, almost wins, tired days, excitement, and growth. And in the middle of all of that, I see you there. I see both of us learning, building, hoping, trying, and still showing up regardless of how things felt at different points.

pages.title: Building Together
pages.content: Working with you this year never felt transactional or forced. It felt organic, like two people who genuinely enjoy thinking, creating, and figuring stuff out together. Whether it was projects, hackathons, ideas that turned loud, or dreams that felt bigger than us, there was a sense of shared energy that I really value. You bring a calm intelligence and a grounded curiosity that makes collaboration feel natural.

pages.title: Your Growth
pages.content: I respect your commitment to AI and ML a lot. The way you think, research, experiment, and grow is something I genuinely admire. You do not just talk growth, you live inside it. Watching your progress this year made me genuinely proud, not just as your friend, but as someone who believes in who you are becoming. You are carving your own path with intention, and that is something rare.

pages.title: The Simple Moments
pages.content: Those times we went out together this year also meant a lot to me. They felt simple, but they were real and refreshing. Sometimes it is easy to forget how meaningful shared presence can be until you pause and look back at it. I really enjoyed those moments, and they are memories I hold fondly.

pages.title: Owltech
pages.content: Forming Owltech with you and Olu is something I deeply cherish. It felt like more than just an idea or a label. It felt like foundation. Like the early pages of a story we are still writing. A story that one day we will look back at and smile, knowing that this was where many things truly began. Being able to dream and build alongside you has been one of the most fulfilling parts of my year.

pages.title: New Beginnings
pages.content: I am also really happy about something important that happened for you at the end of the year. You asked that girl to be your girlfriend on New Years, and she said yes. That moment made me genuinely happy for you. It felt like a beautiful step in your journey, and I pray it brings you joy, peace, understanding, and growth in the best ways.

pages.title: Who You Are
pages.content: You have been a solid friend to me. Someone I can talk to about real things. Someone I can work with, think with, laugh with, and still feel comfortable just existing around. Your presence is steady, intentional, and gentle in its own way. I value that, and I value you.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content: As we step into a new year, I am rooting for you in every sense. I pray 2026 is kind to you. I pray it brings clarity where things feel uncertain, strength where the journey stretches you, and opportunities that match your talent and your heart. I hope your work opens meaningful doors, your creativity keeps expanding, and your life keeps aligning with who you are meant to become.

pages.title: You Deserve Good Things
pages.content: You deserve good things. Not only because you are smart or hardworking, but because of the person you are. Thoughtful. Curious. Genuine. Steady. Intentional. And real. I am grateful that I got to walk through this year with you as my friend, and I do not take that for granted at all.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content:
Thank you for every moment we shared this year. The projects, the ideas, the hackathons, the conversations, the laughter, the quiet understanding, and the sense of partnership in growth. You were a real part of my journey, and I sincerely value you.

More growth ahead. More ideas. More courage. More peace. More life and more stories we will one day look back on together.

youre still a nigga

Your friend,
Murewa

tarotCard.name: Wheel of Fortune
tarotCard.meaning: Cycles of change and destiny are in motion. The Wheel reminds you that life is constantly evolving, and this is your year of transformation. Good fortune favors those who embrace change with intention.

recipient: Emmanuel Ekundayo- My side piece, my favorite affair

pages.title: Hey Emmanuel,
pages.content: I have been thinking a lot about this past year and I realized I could not really sum it up without thinking about you. A huge part of my year was spent in your room, just chilling, laughing, messing around, working, and sending memes. Honestly, I can not even remember how many hours we spent there, but every single one was worth it. You have been such a big part of my 2025, and I wanted to make sure you know that.

pages.title: Same Freakuency
pages.content: Being around you just feels effortless. We have the same freakuency, and it makes everything click naturally. You are just seamless. Whether we were pulling pranks, joking about the silliest things, working on projects, or just sending memes to each other and cracking up, it all felt real and fun. I have never had a friendship where I can laugh so hard, be so random, and still have it feel like we are just vibing perfectly. lowkirkueinly, you get it. You get me.

pages.title: Building Together
pages.content: I have also really appreciated working with you this year. The projects, the hackathons, the brainstorming sessions, and just throwing ideas around with you and Olu for Owltech were some of my favorite moments of the year. It felt like building with someone who actually cares about the work and the people involved, and that is rare. You bring your energy, your sharpness, and your creativity in a way that just makes things feel possible.

pages.title: How Close We Became
pages.content: Beyond all that, I have loved how close we became. Spending all that time together, just hanging out, working, joking, pranking, and talking about life made this year special. You have been a friend I can count on, a friend I can joke with about literally anything, and someone whose company I genuinely enjoy. The way we send memes, the random inside jokes, and the way we can just read each other without even saying much, it all adds up to something really rare.

pages.title: I Am Proud of You
pages.content: I am proud of you, Emmanuel. Seeing how you have grown this year, watching you handle things, push yourself, and stay intentional with your goals, makes me respect you even more. I am genuinely happy that we became closer this year, and I hope you know I value that deeply. You have made my year better just by being in it.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content: As we step into 2026, I hope it brings you even more growth, happiness, and opportunities. I pray it gives you clarity when things feel messy, strength when life challenges you, and joy in all the moments that make it worth it. I hope this year rewards your effort, your energy, your humor, and your seamlessness. I hope we continue to pull pranks, share memes, build ideas, and keep that Charlie Kirk energy alive.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content:
Thank you for being one of the best parts of my year. Thank you for the laughs, the conversations, the work, the pranks, the memes, and the moments we just vibed without a single care. I respect you, I am proud of you, and I am genuinely grateful that we got closer this year.

Here is to more memes, more jokes, more pranks, more projects, more growth, more freakuency, more Charlie Kirk moments, and more memories together in 2026.

Your friend,
Murewa

tarotCard.name: The Fool
tarotCard.meaning: New beginnings and unlimited potential await you. The Fool represents the start of an adventure with boundless optimism. Step forward fearlessly into 2026 - every great journey begins with that first step into the unknown.

recipient: Oluwole Afolabi (My man, my love, oorz)

pages.title: Hey Oluwole,
pages.content: I have been thinking about this past year a lot, and honestly, I could not think about it without thinking about you. So I just wanted to sit down and actually write this to you, because you have been a huge part of my year in ways I do not think I have said out loud enough.

pages.title: Through It All
pages.content: This year was not perfect. It had wins, losses, frustrations, funny moments, tired days, and confusing phases. But through all of that, you were there, not just as someone I talk to once in a while, but as someone who was present. We worked on projects together, shared ideas, encouraged each other, argued sometimes, came back again, and still chose to keep showing up for the friendship. That means a lot to me.

pages.title: Building Together
pages.content: Working with you never felt like just work. It felt like building with someone who honestly cares, someone who is invested in both the project and the person they are working with. There were days when things were stressful, or when plans were not making sense, and your presence alone made it easier to keep going. You bring this energy that makes things feel possible, even when they are tough.

pages.title: Beyond Work
pages.content: I also really value how our friendship exists outside of work. The times we went out, talked, laughed about the most random things, reflected on life, or just chilled, those moments mattered to me. They grounded me. They reminded me that life is more than pressure and goals. It is also about the people you go through it with.

pages.title: Being There
pages.content: And this year especially, I am grateful for the way we were there for each other when things got heavy. You went through your breakup, and even though I could not fix anything, I wanted to be there in whatever way I could. To listen, to talk, or just sit in silence if that was what you needed. Then when I went through that rejection, you did not just brush it off or give surface words. You understood. You encouraged me. You stayed present too. That kind of mutual support is rare, and I do not take it for granted.

pages.title: Shared Victories
pages.content: Helping you get that job and then watching you actually step into it and do your thing was one of those moments that made me genuinely happy. Not just because it worked out, but because I know how much effort, growth, and intention you have been putting into your life. Seeing you win felt personal, like a shared victory.

pages.title: What You Mean To Me
pages.content: You are one of those friends that makes life feel less lonely. Someone I can talk to about real things. Someone I can be honest with without pretending. Someone who understands that friendship is not perfect, but still chooses to show up consistently. And that is something I deeply respect and appreciate about you.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content: As we head into a new year, I am honestly rooting for you in every sense. I pray 2026 treats you kindly. I hope it gives you peace where you have carried weight, strength where you have been stretched, and joy in both the big and small moments. I hope your work opens the right doors, your growth becomes clearer even when the process feels slow, and you continue becoming the person you are meant to be.

pages.title: You Deserve Good Things
pages.content: You deserve good things, not just because you work hard, but because of the kind of person you are. Loyal, sincere, thoughtful, intentional, and real. I am grateful that I get to call you my friend, and I do not take that lightly at all.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content:
Thank you for this year. For the conversations, the support, the jokes, the healing moments, the projects, the encouragement, and just your presence. You have been a solid part of my journey, and I appreciate you more than I probably say.

More life, more growth, more wins, more peace, and more memories ahead.

Oorz,
Murewa

tarotCard.name: The Hermit
tarotCard.meaning: Solitude brings clarity. This year, take time for reflection and self-discovery. The answers you seek are within you. Your introspection and thoughtful nature will guide you to deeper wisdom and understanding.
